review: Best quality and perfect for all our internet watching needs! It has gone above and beyond what I expected. If you have Netflix get this!!!!
author: Clinton Hugh Lunnon

review: I purchased this to play HBO Now but it doesn't carry this app yet even though it has HBO Go
author: scott powers

review: I love it! I use it for youtube.com yoga!!

review: Meets expectations. Quick stream with a decent internet connection. The remote sets it apart from chrome cast which I don't believe has one.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Awesome. Very happy. No reason to spend  $$$$$on a smart TV is you have a perfectly good flat screen. Just get this, plug it in, and voila.
author: Klara Renteria

review: It's awesome and easy to use.
author: Josh

review: Someone told me about this product, but I didn't believe it was as good as they said. I received it, plugged it in & I was amazed. I have access to my favorite shows right at my fingertips for an awesome price. I love the Amazon Fire Stick!!
author: Adelia
